alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 6:12AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will affect Geauga...Cuyahoga... Lake...Ashtabula...Erie and Crawford Counties Until 745 AM EST.... At 610 AM EST, radar indicated an intense band of snow showers along a line extending from 16 miles north of Girard to near Madison to Parma, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 40 mph... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Erie, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Meadville, Conneaut, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Parma, Lakewood, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Westlake, North Royalton, Solon and Willoughby. Use extra caution if you must travel through these snow showers this morning. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 302, 303, 304, 306, 307, 308, 309, 310, 311, 312, 313, 314, 315, 317, 318, 319, 320, 321, 322, 323, 324, 326, 328, 329, 330, 331, and 332.
